title: PGIM Strategic Bond Fund
text:
While evaluating the PGIM Strategic Bond Fund (PUCZX),

I discovered a large drawdown relative to other multi-sector bond funds.

This event largely transpired between November 2015 and March 2016.

Does anyone know what caused this?

Portfolio 1: PGIM Strategic Bond Z (PUCZX)

Portfolio 2: Performance Trust Strategic Bond (PTIAX)

Portfolio 3: PIMCO Diversified Inc Instl (PDIIX)

I have some investment in that fund and find it earns well, but is more volatile, being it hold lots of government below investment grade instruments. I never added much to the fund, see here if this helps explain why the fund is more volatile than PTIAX, which I also hold in a small quantity, which holds more Securitized funds.

https://ycharts.com/mutual_funds/M:PUCAX
